results.content:
Very good explanation of the JavaScript fundamentals.
I'm really happy I have taken the course because I tried to learn JavaScript few times and it seemed to be too complex for me.

I'm sure it's really important to learn programming by building applications and this is exactly what you can expect inside the course!

results.content:
Very well structured course which is almost perfect for beginners.

The author gives a clear and easy to follow code examples on each JavaScript concept he explains. 
After that you implement the applications together with the author where you can apply the skills you've got from the lectures.

results.content:
Very well explained and well structured JS tutorial for beginners.

I was enjoying each lecture since I felt a huge progress from lecture to lecture.
You start learning JS from the ground and eventually have a great skills by the end of the course.

results.content:
Absolutely perfect JavaScript tutorial for beginners!
The instructor is a professional front end developer who knows how to keep you engaged and he's able to explain boring things in interesting and easy to follow way.

He gives a clear code examples on each topic he explains.

By the end of the course you build 5 applications which are really cool and interesting.
results.content_html:
Absolutely perfect JavaScript tutorial for beginners!
The instructor is a professional front end developer who knows how to keep you engaged and he's able to explain boring things in interesting and easy to follow way.

He gives a clear code examples on each topic he explains.

By the end of the course you build 5 applications which are really cool and interesting.

results.content:
The course is really helpful for beginners and people who want to be a professional javascript developers.
When it comes to real world JavaScript programming this is probably one of the best courses to start with - it gives a lot of practice on the real world javascript projects (they're simple enough for beginners).
However it would be nice to add some tests to the course.

results.content: This course provides exactly what I was looking for - clear explanation of all JavaScript concepts which are required to start coding applications. I can recommend it to people who want jumpstart in front end development!

results.content: So far the course is very well explained and I'm learning new things from every lecture. I'm eager to start implementing the projects and I feel more or less confident at this stage.

results.content: I tried to learn JavaScript few times before but it seemed to be too confused for me. With this course I feel much more confident because the teacher is a professional web developer and he explains everything in the details. For now I'm happy I've found this course - ideal for beginners!
